content.detailedDescription:
Late fall to midwinter, i witnessed this at least twice over the last few years. star-like lights of varying colors hovered, danced and disappeared on very clear nights. i was out stargazing a few times over the last few years because i'd heard there would be meteor showers or eclipses. these were definitely not meteors. at first i thought they might be drones or satellites of some sort but they were very fast moving (when they finally moved) and were fairly bright, and i don't think the military would put running lights on drones. it was strange, when i became aware of these lights, they moved not long after i noticed them, kinda zoomed away or disappeared. i felt a little creeped out but mostly mystified. couldn't for the life of me figure out what i'd seen. i'd assumed they must be ufos of a military or supernatural nature. they couldn't have been phosphorescent gas balls because most of the times i've seen them were in late fall to midwinter and phosphorescent gases are produced in hot swampy conditions in the summer.

my friend told me about this site and told me to report these sightings. last year was not the first time i'd seen them. i've mostly seen them in the n-ne sky near my home. appeared to be pretty high up and far away, anywhere from 75* to 90* from the horizon. possibly high in the atmosphere, maybe they were really big and just looked small. i wish i had had a camera with a telephoto lens. sorry for the lateness of the report. i just learned about this site and had to share. i'd like to know if anybody else in my area saw them.
content.summary: Bizarre, color changing star like objects seen multiple times in varying seasons. objects flashed, danced with each other and then zoomed off or disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my ride to school and i was sky watching in the early-morning dark.  i noticed what appeared to be a satellite or high-flying airplane.  it was going in a roughly easterly direction when the object abruptly changed course to a roughly-westerly direction.  there was no stopping or slowing of the object when it made the course change.  this was not the first time i had seen this type of event.  i had witnessed this exact same kind of event a few years earlier, so i was curious as to what the object was doing.  i watched the object for a few more minutes until my ride arrived and had to leave.
content.summary: Straight course movement with abrupt near-180 degree course change without stopping or slowing.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the road, coming from a friend's house at night.  i like to look up at the sky to see if i can see anything, so i was sky watching on my way home.  i observed what appeared to be a satellite, or maybe a high-flying airplane flying on a roughly easterly course.  i watched for a few minutes, and then the object suddenly made a near 180 degree course reversal and was coming in a roughly westerly direction.  the object didn't stop or slow down to make this course change.  seeing as how i was in 6th or 7th grade at the time, it kind of freaked me out and i went inside.  even at that age, i knew that no technology we currently had could make that kind of course change without stopping or slowing down.
content.summary: Straight flight with sudden, near-180 degree course reversal without stopping.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and happened to look up and seen someting strange in the sky, at first it looked like a kite, but there is no way a kite is that high, and it was hovering in one spot, then started to move to the left, and stayed at the same level, and then when i walked away after taking taking pictures and video of it , it disappeared after 3 mins in thin air. i have never seen anyting like this in my life. after looking at the pictures and videos i zoomed in and could see like rotating lights at the bottom of it. i know it was not a plane or a weather balloon because it caught me off guard. i would like for you to look at these pictures, because i know it is noting from this world.
content.summary: Triangle shape someting hanging from it

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was sitting in my porch swing.  the porch faces north.

2.  i noticed the object because it appeared suddenly and was very bright.

3.  the object didn't correspond with anything i had any knowledge of.

4.  what i saw was a bright white light with a slight blueish cast.  this 
    light hovered motionless at about a 45 degree angle from me above the 
    tree line.  off to the right {which would be north-easterly} i saw what   
    appeared to be passenger plane either taking off or coming in for a 
    landing at rdu airport.

5.  my first reaction was surprise.  then i was very curious.  i continued 
    to watch the sky.

6.  i lost sight of the object because it simply vanished.

    please note:  i have waited until now to report this because i wanted to 
                  wait and see if i saw anything else.  

7.  shortly after i saw what i described above i saw a bright white light 
    with a blueish cast appear in the top of a neighbor's tree.  it hovered 
    briefly and then moved to the right and stopped.  it then began to 
    descend.  as it descended it grew yellower, then orange-yellow and 
    progressively changed color until it was orangish-red.  then it dis-
    appeared suddenly.
content.summary: I was sitting on my north facing front porch when i saw a bright light appear and hover motionless at  about a 45-degree angle above the trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just arriving at my home on july 19th at almost 6pm, and was walking from my car into my building. i live on a busy street with a lot of airplanes and helicopters over head all the time. i felt compelled, in my mind and heart, to look into the sky for some reason. as i looked up i immediately noticed an unknown object in the sky. as i observed it i realized i could not identify it, and felt that i should take a video and photos of it. i have observed and experienced unknown things for a long time over the period of my life. while recording the unknown object it was apparent that the quality of the image was not good, and i could not make out any more detail that i was able to observe with the naked eye. having recently recorded and reported another unknown sighting, i thought to snap a photo of the date and time on my phone as well. upon finishing taking photos i had a sense that i was meant to observe this unknown object and document it's presence. this is not the first time i have experienced a seemingly telepathic experience from an unknown object, but it is the first time i have documented and reported it. 

i observed that the object seemed to be ascending in the sky. i thought to myself that it could possibly be a bunch of balloons, but felt uncertain. what i was certain of was the emotions i had associated with being compelled to look into the sky, and to record the object as best i could. once i recorded the object, date and time i did not feel it was necessary to watch the object any more so i went inside my home. when i got upstairs i looked out of the window which faces the same area to see if the object was still seen ascending in the same direction. i could no longer see the object, which was strange since it should have remained viewable if it traveled at the same rate and direction once i went inside. the sighting ended then, and i no longer had any feelings associated with it, accept to make sure to report it. 

i am having a hard time with uploading the images and video for some reason. but i will happily email them to you upon request.
content.summary: I was compelled to look into the sky, as i did i observed an unknown object ascending and found it compelling enough to try to take video and photos with my phone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my front yard throwing frisbee for my dog. it was dusk but more light than dark i heard a sound that was between rushing air and a quiet rumble.  i'm sure if i were inside i wouldn't have heard it.I have timber (doug fir,cedar)along my property line,and as i looked to see what it was, a huge black shape started to appear over the tree tops it seemed extremely low as it came further in to view and was about 3 lengths of my house(prefab 70ft.Long)at least... it was moving so slow. it was completely stable in horizontal position and the speed was absolutely steady.  now, i live in a military fly zone and see and hear jets all day long, fighters, radar planes in air being re-filled with fuel in air by jets and hose,small private craft ect. i thought maybe it was a huge stealth or an experimental object.  i definitely felt like i was being covered or being shut off from the sky.  i have seen jets fly over the house so low you could make out the pilot. the rule is no closer than 500 ft. over houses.Hmm. it may have seemed low because of the huge size. i ran in the house to get my husband and by the time we raced back it was disappearing over the parallel hill toward canada. (60 miles about as the crow flies). from appearance to disappearance was maybe a mile.  my husband didn't see it or hear it. it has bothered since and i have never seen it again. i just thought maybe you would be able to recognize it and have an explaination.

also, i have witnessed at about 11: o'clockp.M. along with my sister in law, 15 years ago, the woods behind my house light up to a blasting bright whiteoriginating on the ground and shooting towards the sky. like someone turned stadium lights only brighter. over about 15 acres my guess.  i thought maybe it was military maneuvers. it was midwinter and we were having a sledding /hot chocolate  party with the kids.  i lasted about 20 full seconds then shut off. where i live are tons of small timber land owners. i think this was on dnr land or forest service land or boise cascade? there have been other objects reported from neighbors.
content.summary: 2-3 football fields wide,seemed even length? black.  looked like the batmobile underneeth, it had molded waves afront to back (like a custom hood for overhead cam or blower) no seems that i could see. it made a breathy sound, quiet but noticable from it

content.detailedDescription: Walking home from dinner i noticed a bright light like a planet moving quickly north to south. i pointed this out to my wife and she agreed the speed was too fast to be a plne , and living here for 20 years we know what planes and helecopters look like. as we observed the object it seemed to slow down and change direction and elevation to the east and climbed in altitude. the direction seemed to cross behind the path of an obvious small plane that was flying e/ne.It didn't seem the plane had any affect on the object. it stayed at a steady brightness throughout the flight and once again decended and quickly went beyond out field of vision/ horizon.
content.summary: Bright light like a planet but moving fast and changed direction and speed

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east home from work. this was in suwanee ga on old peachtree,  about 8.45 pm, it was almost dark. .  at first looked like airplane, lights were horizontal, then it changed direction and lights appeared vertically. it circled slowly, appeared to hover. i watched it hover until i lost it in the trees (maybe 60+ feet). at first i saw white and green lights, then red was added,lights were blinking. i was interested because i thought the plane was flying very low, then when it changed direction and the lights turned vertically i thought it might not be a plane, not sure what else it could be. i felt a little nervous and excited. i called my mom immediately afterwards.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first looked like airplane, lights were horizontal, then it changed direction and lights appeared vertically. it circled slowly, appeared to hover

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving east on farmington rd in beaverton.
2. i just looked over and saw it hovering above the trees.
3. a blimp because it wasn't moving.
4. it was motionless and made no noise.
5. i was excited because i had no idea what it was.
6. i lost site of the object as i continued driving.
content.summary: I was driving home from work and saw an object hovering over the trees in the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
roughly ten years ago, i had an experience that changed the way i look at the universe. i left iowa city, ia where i was living with a friend to have a vacation for a few days. we drove to his parents' farm in the council bluffs, ia/omaha, ne area. specifically, we were right next to the loess hills a few miles from a tiny town called thurman.
     my friend's high school classmate joined us, and we built a large fire where the mowed lawn and trees met the hills and pastures. once the fire was blazing, we mixed drinks (our first and only; we were completely sober through this experience) and took our seats around the fire. we hadn't been sitting for more than 30 seconds when we all seemed to get the feeling that something was watching us and looked up at the top of the treeline. all i remember is a still, dark mass behind the blinding light that was projected at us. as soon as i had looked up, i turned away due to the intensity of the light. i remember looking down at my feet, then at the bonfire in front of them. i distinctly remember the fire disappearing, as the beam of light was far brighter than the fire itself. we were engulfed in the whitest light i have seen for a moment, and i'm not sure what happened next exactly.
     it was like waking from a dream; we were all disoriented and looking around. i rememer yelling "look!" at the guys as i looked to the sky and caught a glimpse of a light zipping up into the atmosphere and disappearing from view. the light had a greenish glow to it; it reminded me of some of the xenon green headlamp bulbs i had seen in friends' souped-up import cars. we stood up immediately, shaken and stumbling around the yard trying to find an explanation for our confusion. we walked around the trees where it seemed that the light had originated for a few minutes before my friend's classmate decided he was too shaken and drove home. we walked around the yard a bit more wondering why the dogs hadn't made a sound if some foreign object had been nearby.
     we went in the house and sat in the basement, confused and trying to calm down. when we noticed the time, we became quite alarmed. it seemed that 2 hours had gone by with a series of events that should have taken less than 15 minutes. "impossible," we thought. we returned to our bonfire to find low-burning coals. the huge fire we had just built looked like it had, indeed, been going for 2 hours. an eerie, terrified feeling descended on us for the rest of the night. we hid in the basement, and my friend huddled in the corner crying.
     we finally got some sleep, and in the morning were surprised that his parents were not at all shocked by this. they had seen ufo's years before our experience hovering in a nearby field, which was followed by the discovery of crop circles in another part of iowa. i feel fortunate to have had others present during this encounter, as it seems almost like a dream to me now. i have been able to check in with my old friend over the years to make sure that it did happen.

     i have been curious about what actually happened to me since the event; today i found that craig r lang, a hypnotherapist and member of mufon, is near where i am now living in minneapolis, mn. i called to inquire about hypnotic regression, and he directed me here. i am certainly willing to cooperate to see what my experience can add to ufo research, and would like to be involved in mufon myself. i had always been open to the idea of life outside earth, but this event made me infinitely curious.
content.summary: Silent, hovering object projects beam of intense light, 2 hours lost. spoke with craig r lang about doing hypnotic regression.

content.detailedDescription: One sunday morning, i woke up and decided to go to church. my sons (ages 15, and 17) attended the service and returned home. my eldest son was driving, and the youngest was in the back seat behind the driver. i looked out above my neighbors house (who lives on the opposite side of the street) and saw a craft. it was just hovering there. the best descrition i can give is, it was shaped similarly to a bicycle seat. it was metallic in color. i asked out loud "what is that?" and pointed towards the craft. my oldest son was putting the car in park as we had just pulled in front of the house. my youngest looked in the direction and said "oh my god!" within a second or two (before my oldest son could look in the general direction), my youngest son and i watched it just vanish. it wasnt as if i had blinked and then it was gone. it literally disintegrated right before our eyes. when my oldest looked in the direction the craft was in, he said i dont see anything. i looked at my youngest, and asked him "did you just see that?" he said "yes....It.Just disappeared!!"
content.summary: My eldest son was pulling up in front of my home when i noticed something in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I know 1996 was a long time ago but i didn't know who to turn to until now. i was sitting in my room and looking out of the window. it was light outside still but the sun was starting to set. there is a forest behind the house and i could see the tree line from my window. as i looked i saw an object rise from the tree lines. it was disc shaped but more rounded on top and flat at the bottom. there were no exterior lights but there were windows around the craft that seemed to show a dark bright yellow coming from inside. the craft itself was a light green. iv never been able to pin point the exact green colour but close enough to explain. the craft was rising slowly into the sky making no noise. it seemed it was being rising by a chube of cloud that met the sides of the craft and up into the sky as far a my eyes could see. i could make out the lines of the cloud tunnel very clearly. the craft kept rising until it was gone. from the distance that i saw this craft i could have a good guess by saying it was easy 100meters in length and around 50 meters in height. for me it hasn't ended there. i have seen strange objects ever since but never get a chance to take videos or photos. people don't believe until they see but i will get evidence. i also believe i was abducted in my sleep a few years back and have seen another world and the human type beings that live there. i think about it all a lot but tell myself it's crazy. i can't live in silence anymore. please help me figure this out mufon. thank you.
content.summary: Green disc with yellow windows. disc seemed to be lifted by a tube of cloud into the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leting my dogs out to go to the bathroom and i was standing there looking up it was around 3am i seen something round it was blinking red yellow and orange flying left to right up and down a girl that lives in ny area has it on her phone it lasted for about 10 to 15 min then blinked out i dont know what i was looking at because i live by the kansas city dowtown airport and i know what a plain is i dont know if we have something that can move like that
content.summary: Something red orange yellow  it was round going fast left to right blinking

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing cricket with friends on that sunny day, with some clouds around. as i was in fielding side i look at the blue sky, i noticed a white dot like object, i thought it was a star, but it was too  early for a star to appear.

1 weybridge vanadals cricket ground, walton on thames. playing cricket.
2 i just looked at beautiful blue sky, as i was waiting for my teammate   bring the ball back for next delivery.
3 i thought it was star, but i had not seen anything like that in day light, specially when sun is out.
4 it was a bright white dot (starlike) high above some clouds flying from west to east direction after about 10 ins i lost view of it because of a cloud.
5 i tried to think it was a star, but it was too early for an star to appear. then i ask one of my teammates if he could see it but he started telling me im having white dotes in my eyes. i forgot about it after the cricket game.
6 i lost sight of the object because of a cloud
content.summary: I was playing cricket with friends in a sunny day, with some cloud. i noticed a white dot like object, i thought it was star, but it was too  early for a star to appear.

content.detailedDescription: I set the camera outside to record the cloud in infrared.  this thing came flying by the camera.  i didn't find it in the video until weeks later once i slowed down the video.
content.summary: It showed up in infrared video

content.detailedDescription: The school bell had just rang. i was making my way from the yard to the school. for an unknown reason, i looked up and observed a large object coming over the trees from the north west. i can attempt to describe it. it was two chinese woks on top of each other separated by a type of slotted metallic structure. it had to be at least 12 to 15 meters across and made no sound.The under belly had a burnt look to it as if someone took a blow torch to it. the object changed its coarse westward and climbed at an incredible speed. in school, at least four other kids saw it as well.
content.summary: Came over school yard made a turn and took off at abnormal speed

content.detailedDescription: I left my apartment and i was going to the store. i looked to my right and say 3 dark orbs with lights behind them. they were in a perfect triangle pattern. they moved up towards an abandoned school across the street when i looked up, all 3 halted for a second, and then continued at a faster speed. i tried to get a better view, but they were gone once they went behind the school. at first, i thought it was group of kids releasing those paper hot air baloons, but the light wasn't coming through the objects, it was coming from around the objects. the sphere was black and shiny. there was a reflective nature to the objects. they emitted a yellow/green light. it felt like the objects saw me. there was no one else around at that time. or at least no one i saw. when i looked up, the objects stopped and hovered in that location. then when i tried to get get a better look, they moved on a little quicker. i wasn't afraid. i was purely curious
content.summary: 3 pulsating dark orbs. black with color changing lights behind objects

content.detailedDescription: Would awake around three two nights before and the night this happened. was awake and looked at the clock it said 5:00 am. looked out my bedroom window and observed a satellite in the sky that i have seen many times before in the sky in the same area. suddenly it started glowing lucent half green half yellow light that looked as though it was pulsating and swirling. then it looked as if an object either emerged from the satellite or docked with it. the object had 6 lights 3 top 3 bottom that were congruent. after this object was completely visible then small orbs shot out of both ends of the satellite swirled around then were no longer visible. while this was on going i noticed 2 small orbs one red one white in my woods about 75 yards away. they were moving up and down in a random pattern. then everything seemed to cease. i looked at the clock and it was 5:30 am. though it only seemed to take a couple of minutes for all this to happen. thought about waking my wife but she was sleeping soundly so i let her sleep. don't know if i went back to sleep but did get up at 6:30 am.
content.summary: See detailed desciption

content.detailedDescription: On july 21, 2015 at 10:00 p.M. i was at home, outside on the back deck star gazing. while observing the night sky i discovered a large object with a bright white light at each end moving silently through the sky. i am unsure of the actual shape of the object since it was dark outside, but the bright white circular light did appear at each end as if there were one light following directly behind the other at the exact same speed. i live near a busy fight path for 2 major airports nearby, boeing field and seatac international. i am very familiar with what aircraft look like at night on approach to either airport since they pass directly overhead, and this object was not a aircraft and it made no sound. i called for my wife to come look, and she too could not figure out what the object was. just a moment or so after observing the object, a commercial aircraft flew overhead on approach to land. it was moving wnw, had all strobes flashing and the landing lights were also on. it seemed to be on a direct crossing path with the object, and that they could possibly intersect each other. the commercial aircraft did seem to descend and its engines sounded as if they were being drastically decreased, a unusual sound for its relative position to the actual airport. a couple minutes later at 10:02 p.M. a smaller jet aircraft approached directly from the south and made a sharp wnw arching turn directly over my house and flew towards the general area where the object and commercial aircraft would have intersected paths at. i am an avid armchair ufo watcher and believer. i have witnessed multiple ufo's during my life, and this object was most definitely very, very odd.
content.summary: Object with bright white light at each end moving wsw through night sky

content.detailedDescription:
one evening in ontario california my mother, my brother, his girlfriend and i were taking our dogs out to go to the bathroom. at this point in time we were homeless and living in a tent city that was just north of ontario international airport. as we all were walking around outside of our little encampment we all seemed to turn our attention to the skyline in the south west.I don't know how to explain it other than it sounded as if something in the sky that wasn't there suddenly in a fraction of a second was.Like it popped into the sky.The day was normal clear sky no wind.All i could hearvwas the sound of something cutting through the air at an unbelievable speed.Kind of a whooshing sound it seemed to come north towards us then change direction back towards the airport,then back again towards us. just off to the left hand side of us where a couple of dead trees that had no leaves on them.The branches on these trees began to whip back and forth at almost 90' degree angles. the sky above us seemed to be distorted and wavey and you could feel the presence of this huge object you could feel it in your body if that makes any sense. mind you our location at that time was in an area that commonly has high winds at times up to 70mph on rare occasions. we never saw these trees do what they were doing that day.There was no feeling of wind no dust being kicked up it wasn't until the event was over i recalled noticing the powerlines above the railroad tracks not 100 feet from the trees weren't swaying.I'm pretty sure the area we were in was "restricted airspace" as we could watch the jet takeoff and land at the airport.You could feel that there was something enormous in the air above us but could see nothing except like waves coming off hot asphalt.This all happened pretty fast the object shot over our heads towards the north west.I remember there was an old man named ken in the camp next to us sitting in his lawn chair he looked at us with a funny look on his face and said "what the hell  was that".Now i consider myself to be a sane fairly smart man i understand the possibility of atmospheric anomalies and other wierd things that might be possible.However this event was special i know there was something there,we all expieriaced this...Thing that happened i wish so bad i new it was going to happen so i could've made other observations but those trees never moved like that again that sound that feeling in my body never happened 
again nothing should have been in the air that day certainly not going back and forth changing direction.We know what happened that day was something not everyone will ever experience.Thanks for reading this i told everyone that would listen keep up the hard work.
content.summary: An unseen object that could be heard and felt affected the trees below it and distorted the atmosphere  above them!

content.detailedDescription:
One night me and 3 other people are sitting on my garden wall and we looked over at the field across from my house. a extremely bright light appears and slowly descents. as it is descending the light fades out. we walk one of my younger friends home because he was scared. a light above the clouds was following us. it turned the clouds a red/orange colour although it was night time and it was dark out.

on the way back to my house we noticed that the light was over our friends house. it started to rain a lot but no water droplets touched the ground. me and my friend were wet thought the ground was not.

we had no idea what this was. everyone went home frightened.
content.summary: Extreme bright light following.

content.detailedDescription: While being upstairs at my mum and dads house the place started to shake very violently and you could hear a very loud noise like a very large and very loud buzzing. i looked out the window and seen something very close to the house no light or anything like that. i did not look long enough to check for anything like details as the house started shaking because of the noise and what ever it was outside. while running down the stairs the pictures on the wall fell off and the noise got louder when we were down stairs we all looked at each other very on what was going on went towards the back door and it just stopped in a split second. my mum rings the local air base that is near there home to complain about what we could only think it was a low flying aircraft as we did not know what else to think. they informed us that there is no air craft out. which made us even more stunned.
content.summary: Passed over house

content.detailedDescription: We were driving east throughly kansas headed back towards mississippi around 5:00am on june 28th 2015. both the driver and i, in the passenger seat in a mid sized sedan noticed a flashing light approximately 200 yards in front of us. we both dismissed the light as a radio signal or some other flashing object in the dark skies. note we were one of the only cars on the road being his early in the middle of nowhere brookville, kansas on interstate 70 going roughly 70/80 mph. we both were startled when the light started flashing again but it didn't get closer to us, as we drove toward the light it stayed the same distance from us so we realized it had to be hovering. is was as close to the ground as a car would be right level with our vehicle and constantly stayed in front of us. almost in an instant is shot quickly behind our vehicle, the driver and i looked in the review mirrors and also turned our heads and it was clearly behind us again about 200 yards away. this startled us because it seemed to disappear and reappear behind us without moving. as soon as we acknowledged that this was a moving vehicle of some sort it jumped back in front of us at an incredible speed as it didn't flash past the vehicle but seemed to disappear and reappear into our front view back 200 yards in front of the vehicle, flashed and instantly disappeared. the driver and i were both spooked after this incident and kept our cell phones out ready to capture and record any other strange sightings we saw. almost 30 minutes to an hour later we noticed a white form or such in the sky, lower than the clouds but definitely at an elevation. it didn't move, it stayed in one spot and wasnt big enough to be a cloud, wasn't a star, or a plane or anything like that. it started off circular then went into an oval shape and then turns flat over the course of 10-15 minutes then it vanished and was no where to be seen. i captured sever photographs of the strange hovering white light object as it changed shaped and eventually disappeared.  there are two witnesses to these two separate events while traveling on interstate 70 throughly thr state of kansas early in the morning in the middle of no where. these were our encounters.
content.summary: First noticed flashing light, changed direction and seemed to disappear and reappear in front and behind us instantly.

content.detailedDescription: I observed the ufo while sitting on my front porch with my brother.  he didn't see it.  it was red and about 30 miles east of me (that is an estimate).  it hovered for about 2-3 minutes and then traveled very fast in an ese direction.  i do not believe it was a firework.  because of the hovering, and what would be the point of a firework that was just a red blob.  kinda boring for a firework.  i estimate that it occurred over blue diamond because that is about 30 miles east of me.  i, of course, was watching the fireworks, and was looking in the east direction and noticed the red glowing object.  i didn't point it out because i thought, initially that it was a firework.  as i continued to watch it just stayed stationary and by the time i decided that it couldn't be a firework, it was gone.  i felt kind of blase about the whole thing, as i was watching it, and it was pretty far away, so...I thought to myself "yep, i just saw a ufo".  i lost sight of the object when it abruptly accelerated away from my line of sight in a ese direction.  the sky was black, there were no clouds.  that's pretty much the long and the short of it.
content.summary: On 4th of july observed a red glowing object 30 miles east from home.

content.detailedDescription: It was 11:08 when i noticed four blinking lights on a platform that appeared square or rectangular. it was mostly clear last night with only a few clouds. it came from the south along i35, it veered northeast over my house and did not appear to bank. it flew past my house, maybe a quarter mile, on it's north east course, when it stopped and hovered. hard to tell. it might have been closer.  the lights were very bright. i had my binoculars with me. nothing special just an old bosch 40 x 20. the structure between the lights was blurry. i live next to randolph air force base. it is common for planes and helicopters to fly over at night.The lighting on these crafts make the outline of the objects show up through the binoculars. not on this. what i could make out was a series of what might have been struts holding it together, but the detail was blurred.The lights on it were dazzling. blue white to ruby red. it was hard to look past the lights to focus on the object. i thought i might be looking at a drone. the lights were flashing and appeared to be changing position on the platform like they were moving or the thing they were connected to was twisting or warping. my eyes were being overwhelmed by the flashes and i got a sense of vertigo from watching. when i lowered my binoculars the lights went out. i thought it disappeared but then out of the corner of my eye i saw another one. looking just like the first. it flew to where i thought the other one was. it two was flashing the same kind of blue white light with the one intense red one. i watched it through my binoculars but it was as blurry as the first. it flashed it's red light several times. the light was so intense it seemed to light up the inside of my binoculars. i got that feeling of vertigo again, and put my binoculars down, to rub my eyes. it was still flashing when i looked back, but then it started moving north east again. the first one i saw was back where i first saw it disappear with it's flashing lights on. it then started to follow the second one still heading to northeast, in the direction of seguin texas. they moved slowly, (like they were looking or scouting for something) beyond my field of vision, their lights blinking a dimmer version of the white blue light and they started strobing or pulsing pretty fast before completely fading out. i don't know if they turned them off or if they just disappeared, before living my field of view. i checked my watch it was 1118 pm. i saw them for a total of 8 minutes. but it only felt like 2 minutes for the whole thing to happen. that was kind of strange. after they were gone  every time i would close my eyes i would see that red light like it seared my retina, like when one glances at the sun or a welding arch. when i closed my eyes to go to sleep i could still see it. but this morning everything is fine.Only i'm kicking myself for not having my phone or camera on me. i wanted to run inside and grab them, but i could not take my eyes off of what i was seeing, and i did not want to loose them or miss anything. that's my story. the only other thing i want to add is as i was watching the second one, for a moment i had i feeling it was watching me, watching it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw two square (cubed) shaped objects in the sky.One arrived first as if waiting for other. the other arived from same direction they then proccedded off in a north east direction..

content.detailedDescription: Myself and wife observed pulsating red light in the distance due west from our home location, as we observed the object for several minutes we both noticed it moving towards our location heading east in a straight path and as it got directly over us we noticed the shape and red glowing power source concentric but smaller then the craft as we could actually see the outline of the total size of thee object or disc., and then as it was overhead and still moving slowly east it then picked up great speed and just disappeared in the eastern part of the cascade mtn. range like a direct path to mt. adams. we were in awe and we are positively certain without any doubt that what we were seeing was "most definitely a ufo" 100% sure as nothing moves like that and with that speed.
content.summary: Outer solid perfect round with a glowing red energy source in smaller dia. center.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were driving together on texas highway 71 approaching marfa, texas near valentine, texas, when we saw multiple flashing lights in the sky ahead of us. as we approached the nearest location to the lights we stopped and i retrieved my 20 power olympus camedia camera and started zooming in and out snapping multiple shots. my brother used his binoculars to verify the numbers of objects and he said "there are nine of them!". the nine circular objects seem to circle each other in groups of 2 or 3 while they illuminating themselves sequentially. we stayed there for 15 minutes or so while they continued to maneuver in full view. before we drove off (with the ufo's continuing their maneuvering) we observed a gate, driveway and sign "government property no trespassing". i later found out after talking with the valentine sheriff's office that was the gate to aerostat marfa location. https://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/tethered_aerostat_radar_system 
when i called the aerostat marfa facility the next day they simply said what my brother and i saw was most likely the nav-lights on their balloon they had launched in that same time frame. when i asked how many lights are on the balloon they said "three". i said we saw nine objects illuminating! they put "langley" on the line with us and langley said same thing . . . "...We most likely saw nav-lights" on their balloon. langley asked me to email them my pics (which i did) and they said they would reply with their comments . . . which they did a couple weeks later simply stating the same thing "what you and your brother saw that night was the nav-lights on the balloon which was launched that evening".
content.summary: Multiple objects alternately flashing and circling each other in groups of two or three.

content.detailedDescription:
My best friend and i had gone to a night trail ride at the riding stable we were working at for the summer. the ride was broken into 2 segments with a break for chili and drinks in the middle. i was 16 at the time and did not like the taste of beer, tho my best friend loved it, so when the group was done eating but several wanted to have a couple of beers before going back out, a younger girl and i decided to ride the first part of the trail ahead of the group and wait for the others at the top of the ridge since neither of us wanted to drink. we sat on our horses looking out over the valley and chatting when we noticed a light with blinking lights to our ne moving slowly from se to nw. at first we were not concerned as there was a guard post that often flew helicopters in the region and we assumed that was what it was. it would travel a short distance, 100 yards or so, descend, be at ground level for about 20 seconds, rise back up to about 100', then repeat the process. our horses were also watching the light closely, which was why we paid attention to it...Heads up, ears & eyes locked on it, snorting a bit. it took several minutes before we noticed that it did not sound like a normal helicopter, there was only a loud hum not the chopping sound one would normally associate with a helicopter. at that point we began to not only watch it closely but comment on it and ask each other questions about it, like "what the heck is that" and "what do you think it's doing". i finally noticed that it seemed to be following the exact path of the high tension wires that cross the valley, just a few seconds before it went down again almost due north of our position. about 5 seconds after that descent the lights all across the valley went out, quite noticeable as the local saw mill worked 24/7 and always lit up the horizon so when their lights went out it was immediately obvious. the object rose up one more time, and now the horses were both trembling and very tense, snorting loudly and shifting about. the lights began to blink more rapidly, and the hum became almost a whine and rose in pitch an instant before the thing shot straight up and out of sight, gone in a matter of moments. that was it for the horses, they both bolted for home and we had our hands full just staying with them for the panicked gallop back to the barn. we told the others what we had seen to open scoffs and ridicule, so we did not talk about it except to each other the rest of that evening. perhaps 10 minutes after the object vanished and we had started back out for the last half of the ride, 4 helicopters flew over the area, criss-crossing the entire valley, flying for the better part of an hour. 
my best friend and i had planned on camping at the stable since it would be 2am or later when the ride would be over and the horses all put up, and the next morning she listened to the events of the night before with less scepticism, and agreed to ride to the top of the high pasture where the power line towers crossed the property of the stable. when we reached the one closest to the fence line, the base of which was about 20' on the other side of the fence in a wheat field, we could clearly see from horseback that the wheat was flattened down in a circle, swirled in a perfect spiral just like what we would later hear about as crop circles, with three deep square indentations in a perfect triangle just inside the outer edge of the circle. at that point my friend became quite frightened and to this day has refused to discuss anything that she saw.
being 16 at the time and having been ridiculed on the night of the event, it was many years before i was willing to discuss this with anyone. i realize now that had i spoken up there might have been physical evidence retrieved from the site.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light with flashing lights moving, landing and rising then moving again

content.detailedDescription:
I take pictures of clouds. in this image i noticed the orb. curious, i zoomed in on it and saw this round thing, apparently 3 dimensional from shadows,that also has white circles on its curved outer surface. 
i asked people to identify the thing and no one could. 
then i was researching 'orbs in the sky' and ran across your report of utah case 60490 that has the exact same image.
content.summary: Noticed an object in photo. zoomed in...
